env.name: LOG_LEVEL
env.description: Set log level to output for plugin logs

env.name: LOGZIO_DRIVER_LOGS_DRAIN_TIMEOUT
env.description: Set how often we send messages (time.duration value)

env.name: LOGZIO_DRIVER_CHANNEL_SIZE
env.description: Set number of messages waiting in the buffer before pushing to queue and sending them

env.name: LOGZIO_DRIVER_DISK_THRESHOLD
env.description: Set maximum queue disk size ( in %)

env.name: LOGZIO_MAX_MSG_BUFFER_SIZE
env.description: Used when logs that are chunked by docker with 16kb limit. Set the biggest message that the system can reassemble.

env.name: LOGZIO_MAX_PARTIAL_BUFFER_DURATION
env.description: How long the buffer keeps the partial logs before flushing them.
